grp_mapping.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 
2 //This node generates occuapncy map from lasersacn msgs,
3 //publishes the map transformed to Image msg
4 //and visualize Occupancy map using rviz
5 
6 #include <ros/ros.h>
7 #include <sensor_msgs/LaserScan.h>
8 #include <opencv2/opencv.hpp>
9 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
10 #include <sensor_msgs/image_encodings.h>
11 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
12 #include <sensor_msgs/Image.h>
13 #include <nav_msgs/OccupancyGrid.h>
14 
15 cv::Mat map;
16 double res;
17 int map_y_range;
18 int map_x_range;
19 double map_origin_x;
20 double map_origin_y;
21 double world_x_min;
22 double world_x_max;
23 double world_y_min;
24 double world_y_max;
25 
26 double map_size = 10; // Originally occupancy map range is 10m * 10mx and robot is located in the center
27 int mat_size = 800; // Originally occupancy map(openCV) size is 800 * 800
28 int grid_map_size = 300; // Originally occupancy map(rviz) size is 300*300
29 double map_resize_const = 1; // if you increase this value, window size(now 10m) becomse smaller(10m/map_resize_const)
30 
31 
32 ros::Publisher occupancygrid_pub;
33 void visualize();
34 void sensor_callback(sensor_msgs::LaserScan msgs);
35 
36 int main(int argc, char** argv){
37 
38  ros::init(argc, argv, "grp_mapping");
39  ros::NodeHandle n;
40 
41  ros::Subscriber sensor_sub = n.subscribe("/scan", 1, sensor_callback);
42  occupancygrid_pub = n.advertise<nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid>("occupancygrid", 1);
43 
44  image_transport::ImageTransport it_(n);
45  image_transport::Publisher map_pub;
46  map_pub = it_.advertise("/grp_navi/map", 1);
47 
48  map = cv::Mat::ones(ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const), ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const), CV_8UC1) * 255;
49 
50  world_x_min = -(double)(map_size / (2 * map_resize_const));
51  world_x_max = (double)(map_size / (2 * map_resize_const));
52  world_y_min = -(double)(map_size / (2 * map_resize_const));
53  world_y_max = (double)(map_size / (2 * map_resize_const));
54 
55  res = (double)(map_size / mat_size);
56 
57  map_origin_x = ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const / 2.0) - 0.5;
58  map_origin_y = ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const / 2.0) - 0.5;
59 
60  while (ros::ok())
61  {
62  cv_bridge::CvImagePtr cv_ptr(new cv_bridge::CvImage);
63  cv_ptr->encoding = "mono8";
64  cv_ptr->image = map;
65  map_pub.publish(cv_ptr->toImageMsg());
66  ros::spinOnce();
67  ros::Rate(100).sleep();
68  }
69  return 0;
70 }
71 
72 
73 void sensor_callback(sensor_msgs::LaserScan msgs){
74 
75  map = cv::Mat::ones(ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const), ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const), CV_8UC1) * 255;
76 
77  nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid grid_map;
78 
79  double ref = mat_size/map_resize_const/grid_map_size;
80 
81  geometry_msgs::Pose pose;
82 
83  pose.position.x = -map_size/map_resize_const/2; // Locate the robot at the center of Occupancy grid
84  pose.position.y = -map_size/map_resize_const/2;
85 
86  grid_map.header.frame_id = "RosAria/odom";
87  grid_map.header.seq = 0;
88  grid_map.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
89 
90  grid_map.info.resolution = res*ref;
91  grid_map.info.width = grid_map_size;
92  grid_map.info.height = grid_map_size;
93  grid_map.info.origin = pose;
94 
95  grid_map.data.resize(grid_map_size * grid_map_size);
96  grid_map.data.assign(grid_map.data.size(), 0); // nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid data : if occupied 100, else 0 (not using uncertain value -1 in this code)
97 
98  double x, y, mapx, mapy;
99 
100 
101  for (int i = 0; i <= (msgs.angle_max - msgs.angle_min) / msgs.angle_increment; i++){
102 
103  if (msgs.ranges[i] < msgs.range_max && msgs.ranges[i] > msgs.range_min){
104 
105  x = -msgs.ranges[i] * cos(msgs.angle_min + msgs.angle_increment*i);
106  y = -msgs.ranges[i] * sin(msgs.angle_min + msgs.angle_increment*i);
107 
108  mapx = (x / res + map_origin_x);
109  mapy = (y / res + map_origin_y);
110 
111  if (mapx > 0 && mapx < ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const) && mapy > 0 && mapy < ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const)){
112 
113  cv::circle(map, cv::Point(mapy, mapx), ceil(20), 0, -1);
114 
115  mapx /= ref;
116  mapy /= ref;
117 
118  if (ceil(mapy) < ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const / ref) || ceil(mapx) < ceil(mat_size / map_resize_const / ref)){
119 
120  int tmp = (grid_map_size - ceil(mapx))*grid_map_size + ceil(mapy);
121 
122  if (tmp < ceil(grid_map_size)*ceil(grid_map_size) && tmp >= 0)
123  grid_map.data[tmp] = 100;
124 
125  }
126  }
127  }
128  }
129 
130  int k_size = 51;
131 
132  if (k_size % 2 == 0)
133  k_size += 1;
134 
135  cv::GaussianBlur(map, map, cv::Size(k_size, k_size), 10);
136 
137  occupancygrid_pub.publish(grid_map);
138  visualize(); // If you do not want to see map using openCV window, erase this line.
139 
140  cv::waitKey(1);
141 
142 }
143 
144 
145 void visualize(){
146 
147  cv::namedWindow("Mapping", 0);
148  cv::imshow("Mapping", map);
149  cv::waitKey(1);
150 
151 }
